sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Card, Image } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function BookCard({ book, link }) { const content = ( <> {book.title} isbnID: {book.isbnId} Author: {book.director} Year: {book.year} ) return ( !link ? {content} : {content} ) } export default BookCard
